full_description:
Xpert XL21 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds

The Xpert XL21 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds offer a smooth and stable connection with Bluetooth 5.0 technology. They have a Zhongke Lanxun 5616T3 chip, which offers high-quality sound transmission and low power consumption. The Xpert XL21 Earbuds have a 200mAh battery in the charging case, which recharges the earbuds up to seven times and extends the battery life to 28 hours. The earbuds have a 28mAh battery in each earbud, providing up to 4 hours of talk or music time. The earbuds also have a standby time of 300 hours without being used. The Xpert XL21 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds have a lightweight and ergonomic design that can fit comfortably and securely in your ears. They also have a water-resistant coating, protecting them from sweat and rain.

full_description:
Xpert Xpod ANC TWS Bluetooth Earbuds

The Xpert Xpod ANC TWS Bluetooth Earbuds are a pair of wireless earbuds that offer excellent sound quality with noise-canceling features. These earbuds use Bluetooth 5.3+ EDR technology for a stable and fast connection with the device. The Xpert TWS Earbuds come with a built-in microphone and a controller, enabling hands-free calls and easy control of music and volume. The Xpert TWS Earbuds have a 30 mAh battery in each earbud and a 400 mAh charging case, recharging the earbuds up to four times and extending the battery life to 12 hours. The Xpert Xpod TWS Earbuds charging case is equipped with a USB-C port that can charge the case fully in 70 minutes. The TWS Earbuds have a 10mm speaker with a 32-ohm impedance and a 20–20KHz frequency response. They also have an active noise-canceling feature to reduce ambient noise and enhance the listening experience. The Xpert Xpod ANC TWS Bluetooth Earbuds have a lightweight and ergonomic design that can fit comfortably and securely in your ears.
